channel.title: A couple of questions
channel.description:
Well number one. i am running a 317 server, and i need to know.
1. How do you change prices of the items in the shop? For example Ags is like 100m i want it to be 500m.
2. How do you deleted items or add items to a shop.
3. How do you add a new shop.
And if anyone would like to be coding for my server that would be great, if not.. just try to answer the questions!:D thanks.
